actions.name: Sticky Hold
actions.description: Effect: The user's Equipped items cannot be stolen or affected by Knock Off. The user's @Affliction[grapple] Maneuver checks are one degree more successful.

system.description: Effect: The user's Equipped items cannot be stolen or affected by Knock Off. The user's @Affliction[grapple] Maneuver checks are one degree more successful.
